title: pAmagaLE varuga
sahitya:
pAmagaLE varuga tuNaiyAga nAn pADumiDam araNmanaiyAga ammA


anupallavi

  kOmagaL vandu koluvirukka angu nAmagaL jnAnap-pAlUTTa
pUmagaL vandu vaLangozhikka kUDum kuzhuvinar pArATTa ammA


caraNam    tALattil aDangip-pADi angum pATTin tanmaiyil aDangit-tALam iyangum
kAlattil aDangi vAzh viyangum undan karuNaiyinri uyir iyangum ammA
